name: 沈耀明
objective: 資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtual memory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
schedule:
1	Course Introduction
2	Ch1. Introduction to Computer Organization
3	Ch2. Data Representation in Computer Systems
4	Ch2a. Focus on Codes for Data Recording and Transmission
5	Ch3. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
6	Ch3a. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
7	Holiday清明節放假
8	Ch4. An Introduction to a Simple Computer
9	Ch4a An Introduction to a Simple Computer
10	Midterm Test期中考
11	Ch5. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
12	Ch5a. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
13	Ch5b. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
14	Ch6. Memory
15	Ch6a. Memory
16	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems
17	Ch7a. Input/Output and Storage Systems
18	Final Test 期末考
scorePolicy:
1.	期中考佔35%
2.	期末考佔40%
3.	作業佔10%, 每次佔2.5%, 遲交一天扣0.5%.
4.	出席狀況佔10%, 每缺席一次扣1%, 遲到早退扣0.5%.
5.	課堂表現佔5%, 缺席超過3次者本項分數為0分.
materials:
本學期使用的課本:
書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 2/e
作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
代理商: 東華書局
連絡人: 儲方
電話:0988202210
